item.title: Time.now.to_s(:magic)
item.description: Many Rails developers default to strftime for converting their dates to appropriate strings. However, Rails has the often overlooked time conversion extensions which are must faster on the draw: > t = Time.now => Sat Dec 10 11:14:04 -0500 2011 > t.to_s(:db) => "2011-12-10 11:14:04" > t.to_s(:time) => "11:14" > t.to_s(:short) => "10 Dec 11:14" > t.to_s(:number) => "20111210111404" To see a complete listing of the formats look no further than Time::DATE_FORMATS.
